#### autogenerated schema for sqlite3

```
CREATE TABLE `user_roles` (`user_id` integer,`role_id` integer,PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`,`role_id`),CONSTRAINT `fk_user_roles_user` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`),CONSTRAINT `fk_user_roles_role` FOREIGN KEY (`role_id`) REFERENCES `roles`(`id`));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "users" (`id` integer,`created_at` datetime,`updated_at` datetime,`deleted_at` datetime,`full_name` text,`name` text,`email` text,`password` text,PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
CREATE INDEX `idx_users_deleted_at` ON `users`(`deleted_at`);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "roles" (`id` integer,`created_at` datetime,`updated_at` datetime,`deleted_at` datetime,`name` text,`description` text,PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
CREATE INDEX `idx_roles_deleted_at` ON `roles`(`deleted_at`);
CREATE TABLE `resources` (`id` integer,`created_at` datetime,`updated_at` datetime,`deleted_at` datetime,`path` text,PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
CREATE INDEX `idx_resources_deleted_at` ON `resources`(`deleted_at`);
CREATE TABLE `resource_roles` (`resource_id` integer,`role_id` integer,PRIMARY KEY (`resource_id`,`role_id`),CONSTRAINT `fk_resource_roles_resource` FOREIGN KEY (`resource_id`) REFERENCES `resources`(`id`),CONSTRAINT `fk_resource_roles_role` FOREIGN KEY (`role_id`) REFERENCES `roles`(`id`));
```
